word_mean: 司格蒙旋花，药旋花(根)：学名为Convolvulus scammonia(旋花科)，该植物产于小亚细亚及叙利亚。其根可提供具有驱肠虫及导泻作用的粘性及树脂性渗出液

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, from Old French escamonie or Latin scammonia, from Greek skammōnia

means.word_mean: 2. resin from the root of Convolvulus scammonia
3. twining plant of Asia Minor having cream to purple flowers and long thick roots yielding a cathartic resin
